original_text: And they washed the chariot by the pool of Samaria, and the dogs licked up his blood, and the prostitutes washed themselves in it, according to the word of the Lord that he had spoken.
korean_text: 그 병거를 사마리아 못에서 씻으매 개들이 그의 피를 핥았으니 여호와께서 하신 말씀과 같이 되었더라 거기는 창기들이 목욕하는 곳이었더라

sentences.original_text: And they washed the chariot by the pool of Samaria
and the dogs licked up his blood
and the prostitutes washed themselves in it
according to the word of the Lord that he had spoken
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 주께서 말씀하신 말씀대로 된 것입니다
